title: 617 - Choose Your Pun | Star Trek Sleep Discovery
description:
Lorca sees the light as you cross over to dreamland. PJs will be worn as Heimlich heads into the stars. (Trek talk starts about 18:10)

 

Thanks to all the listeners who give “value for value” by becoming patrons on Patreon @ http://www.sleepwithmepodcast.com/patron

 

Commission a Song from Jonathan Mann @ song.jonathanmann.net
